name: Qatar Aeronautical Academy (QAA)
about: Qatar Aeronautical Academy (QAA), established in 1977 as the Civil Aviation College of the Gulf States, is a leading institution in aviation training. Renamed in 2019, QAA offers full-time approved courses for pilots, aircraft maintenance engineers, air traffic controllers, meteorologists, airport operations management personnel, and security staff. The academy provides a range of pilot training programs, including the Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL) and Multi-Crew Pilot License (MPL), using a modern fleet of glass cockpit aircraft. With a mission to develop leaders in civil aviation using the latest training systems, QAA is committed to achieving the highest international quality standards, making it a premier choice for aviation education globally. QAA continues to expand its training capabilities through international partnerships, ensuring the highest standards of safety and success for its students.
services:
["Advance Masters Program in Aviation Safety Management (ASM)
Pilot Training Division
Aircraft Maintenance Engineering
Meteorology
Air Traffic Control
Advanced Aviation Management"]
